-----Original Message-----
From: mlockridge01 [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 02, 2002 12:06 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] News on Alakhazam


I just read the news for April 1 on Alakhazam. Thought there would be
some discussion on that here. None. Is everyone waiting to see if it
is an April Fools day joke? I am hoping it is. If you haven't read it
yet, pop over to Al and have a look.

Barto Proudfoot
